price: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it swallowed up all objects of their illusion.
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
